description: With the magic katana, Matsuri tries to forcefully stab her opponent who moves out of the way but still gets wounded on her shoulder. While Aono runs away, Yorito is left badly injured and losing his life force. Matsuri tells him to not intervene any more and goes after Aono. During the fight, Matsuri loses her sword, and Aono takes it up to shove it into Matsuri...
